price: We showed Pharaoh all Our signs, but he rejected them and refused to believe.
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ أَرَيۡنَٰهُ ءَايَٰتِنَا كُلَّهَا فَكَذَّبَ وَأَبَىٰ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
